meanings.definition: Not involved in a close emotional or social relationship.
meanings.sent1: She preferred nonbonding friendships to avoid drama.
meanings.sent2: Their nonbonding connection was purely professional.
meanings.sent3: The nonbonding colleagues only interacted during work hours.
meanings.sent4: Their nonbonding relationship was like ships passing in the night.
meanings.sent5: The nonbonding neighbors kept to themselves in the apartment building.
